section.title: Instalation
section.para: Installing of &pod2docbook; should be as easy and streight forward as executing cpan -i Pod::2::DocBook. This will add pod2docbook script to the system. See for description.

section.title: DocBook quick start guide
section.para: In folder examples/pod2docbook-docbook/ of &pod2docbook; is the source of this document. To generate the HTML or PDF version from it you'll need: make, xmllint, xsltproc, fop and docbook xml+xsl.
For Debian: apt-get install docbook-utils psutils docbook-xml docbook-xsl xsltproc fop make. To have images in the PDF you need to get jimi and copy jimi.jar to /usr/share/java/jimi-1.0.jar
Then just do make or make Pod-2-DocBook.html or make Pod-2-DocBook.pdf to generate this "book".
